entry.title: Family of the Year...Because No One Else Entered the Contest
entry.summary:
Author: Eboni_A

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 103,290Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 410

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne are officially married and the adoptive parents of five very active teenagers: Conner, 16, new to families and basic human interaction; Robin, 15, on his way to the Olympic Trials for the US Men’s Gymnastics Team; Jason, 14, a child star about to take on the biggest movie role of his career; Tim, 13, training to be more than a back-up hero; and Damian, 12, ready to step into his father’s work boots and cowl.With their time divided between Gotham and New York City, Clark and Bruce struggle to remain a sane, united front while drowning in the chaotic drama that is teenagers left to their own devices when Jason’s birth mother wants to become a permanent fixture in his life, Robin’s behavior becomes erratic after a celebration turns tragic, Tim fears the feelings he has for Conner, Conner doubts his acceptance into the family, and Talia Al Ghul threatens to visit.For some unions, love just isn’t enough to keep it all together. It’s Clark and Bruce against the world, but can they succeed, when it seems that even their own children are on the opposing side?

entry.title: The Psychic in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: BweepBoop

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,632Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 177

Summary: Bruce has been Batman for a very long time and the wear and tear of the city’s innate tragedy is starting to get to him. Estranged from his kids, left by those he loved; only Alfred remains and even that bond is starting to fray.He has no idea how to fix any of this. Luckily, an eight year old psychic might be exactly what was needed to thaw his icy heart.OR:Shigeo might not be a Robin but hell if he wasn’t absolutely a Bat

entry.title: Why doesn’t he want me, man?
entry.summary:
Author: BeelzebubsBois

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,037Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 16

Summary: After another fight between the dark knight and his son, during a particularly stressful night of patrol, Damian runs away to Dick’s house to ask for help. Long term help.Damian, Dick, and Wally learn to navigate life as a family with the help of Wally’s dads, Dick’s siblings, and a lot of trial and even more errors.But they never give up on the life they know they can build for themselves.

entry.title: Make It Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: waynewolfling

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,981Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 170

Summary: Gotham’s most infamous billionaire playboy, Bruce Wayne, has spent years building a reputation—just not a good one. Between scandalous headlines, a trail of ex-lovers, and his ridiculous reality TV show, Make It Wayne, no one takes him too seriously. And that’s exactly how he likes it.But when life introduces him to one encounter after another with a painfully charming journalist, Bruce starts to wonder if he’s finally losing control of the carefully crafted mess that is his life.(Or: Bruce Wayne is a disaster, Clark Kent supposedly has his life together, and somehow, feelings start getting involved. And a bunch of other stuff happens.)

entry.title: In Spite of All the Danger
entry.summary:
Author: crazyredd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,190Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 88

Summary: Clark’s heart sank as he looked towards Bruce. They’d had this restaurant reservation for weeks now and it feels like they rarely have any time when they’re both free.“I’ve just been called into work. Perry specifically requested me,” Clark sighed heavily as he lied.Bruce couldn’t hide the disappointment on his face.But before he could say anything he looked up at Clark and saw a beam of light out the window past his shoulder. The Bat-Signal.

entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,481Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 82

Summary: The gun fires twice. Blood and pearls fill the alleyway. The boy comes to a resolution. Years later in the mountains of Nepal, while honing his skills beneath the exacting gaze of Ra’s al Ghul, the boy comes to a crossroads.He makes his choice.The Batman never comes to be. The more things change, the more they stay the same.

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,722Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 54

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.

entry.title: dragon in the new warm mountain
entry.summary:
Author: outboard

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,242Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 93

Summary: The itch always starts on his back, between his shoulder blades, and it’s not so much an itch as it is this unignorable urge to abandon his vulnerable skin and give himself over to hardened black scales and large, powerful wings. or: Bruce Wayne is a dragon shifter, and while out flying one night, Superman falls from the sky. Dragon shifters are rare, and putting himself in close proximity to the most powerful man on earth is not a good idea, but Superman is unconscious in the dirt, and what is Bruce supposed to do—leave him there, vulnerable and unguarded?Against his best judgement—no. No he is not.

entry.title: Baternity Leave
entry.summary:
Author: Gentlefolk_fica

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,673Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 430

Summary: Disbelieving what he was looking at, he turned back to the computer across the cold stone expanse.“Computer- analyze results.”The computer downloaded the ultrasound data and cross-referenced it with his other symptoms.“Additional heartbeat detected. Fetal life form present. Estimated: 7-8 weeks gestation”Bruce blinked again. Ever the logical one when faced with a crisis, he asked: “Any additional data?”“Kryptonian DNA detected.”That’s when Bruce gave himself permission to panic.

entry.title: Finding Love (Right Here)
entry.summary:
Author: xx_Katya_xx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,514Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 786

Summary: Damian Wayne, the proclaimed Prince of Gotham and son of billionaire philanthropist Bruce Wayne, has for some ungodly reason accepted an arranged marriage proposed by his estranged mother.His father and brothers have very big opinions on this decision. And so does his best friend, Jon Kent.-OR-Damian, for all his negative attitude and showboating, is secretly a romantic and just wants someone to love. No Capes/Heroes AURAPE WARNING - mentions of rape thats happened previously. Not between any tagged relationships but between Talia and Bruce.

entry.title: Breaking the wall
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,527Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 89

Summary: It took Bruce a long time to trust Superman. The man was an alien with god-like powers—if he ever decided to take over the planet, who could stop him? So, sue Bruce for not believing Superman was genuinely good, saving humanity for purely unselfish reasons. But it wasn’t years of working together that changed Bruce’s mind. It wasn’t even Superman revealing his secret identity as Clark Kent, though that had softened Bruce considerably. What finally broke through Bruce’s wariness was something small. A joint mission in Gotham. Or, Bruce finally lets go of his fear and decides to trust Clark completely.
